item.title: Forward Cargo Air Conditioning (A/C) Overboard Valves

remarks.para: May be inoperative provided one valve remains closed.

note.para: Forward Cargo A/C will be unavailable.
The following EICAS message(s) may be displayed:

numlitem.para: Carriage of animals, or perishables is prohibited in the forward cargo compartment.

placard.para: Placard below Captain’s PFD on P-1-1 panel "FWD CARGO OVBD BKUP VLV(s) INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: Manually close and verify that the cargo overboard valve or the cargo overboard backup valve remains closed by either method 1 or 2.
To verify this, check the EICAS MAINTENANCE PAGE as follows:
On the CDU select Menu, CMC, EICAS, MAINTENANCE PAGE.
The lower EICAS will display both valves. The CGO OVERBOARD VALVE is closed when O.O. is displayed, the BACKUP VALVE will display CLOSED.
Method 2: Manual Check or Valve Not Closed.
Check the manual override lever on these valves in the fwd lower cargo compartment RH side, however pallet position "3" must be empty to access.
To ensure these valves remain closed, pull following CB's on panel P180 (located in the RH tunnel fwd of the E/E compartment).

entry.para: FWD CGO EXT BUP VLV PWR
